property.name: style
property.description: Gets or sets the Style option.

property.name: iconFont
property.description: Gets or sets the IconFont option.

property.name: symbolType
property.description: Gets or sets the SymbolType option.

property.name: symbolActive
property.description: Gets or sets the SymbolActive option. Symbol which is shown, when the alarmclass has an active alarm.

property.name: symbolInactive
property.description: Gets or sets the SymbolInactive option. Symbol which is shown, when the alarmclass has an inactive alarm.

property.name: foregroundColor
property.description: Gets or sets the ForegroundColorActive option. Color of the symbol which is shown, when the alarmclass has an active alarm.

property.name: backgroundColor
property.description: Gets or sets the BackgroundColorActive option. Color of the background which is shown, when the alarmclass has an active alarm.

property.name: foregroundColorInactive
property.description: Gets or sets the ForegroundColorInactive option. Color of the symbol which is shown, when the alarmclass has an inactive alarm.

property.name: backgroundColorInactive
property.description: Gets or sets the BackgroundColorInactive option. Color of the background which is shown, when the alarmclass has an inactive alarm.

property.name: priority
property.description: Gets or sets the Priority option. Priority of the alarmclass, when the useCustomPriority property is checked.

property.name: useCustomPriority
property.description: Gets or sets the UseCustomPriority option. Wether to use the priority defined in the priority property instead of the system priority.

property.name: alarmClassName
property.description: Gets or sets the AlarmClassName option. Class name of the alarmclass defined in the server.
